replies.body:
HOLY MOTHER MARY! Where the fuck is your grammar dude?

I am not even going to bother reading that, but from what I can gather from the replies, you want a system that detects if someone is feeding and ban them or some shit?

The only system I can see that would work, is one that you can put people on a Do Not Play list. Yes, you can abuse this, but at least when those, unfortunately like yourself OP, put enough of us on that list, we will not have to play with you and therefore we get the better players.

You see, I couldn't care less for the win, I don't care for what KDA anyone gets, how much CS, or how useful they are, if they shut the fuck up and actually try to play the game, that is all that matters to me. You can suck ass for all I care, if you try your best I know you are at least trying, or pretending to try, that works for me. I care more for those who are aggressive little shits with an attitude problem and want them out than I do for bad players.

While it is frustrating to have these types of players in your games, your idea has been posed before. The issue is that no matter what you do, it can be abused so easily. 

* If you don't want to lose LP, you can flame someone till the rage quit. 
* One person could also "take one for the team" and leave. 
* Same happens if you don't like the look of the enemy comp/ lolnexus them to find out they are all better than you. Just make someone quit.
* As for the feeders, sometimes people get camped and end up dying a lot
* People on tilt die a lot
* Like *JustTrash* said, someone can suck the entire game but be the sole reason their team wins in the end. 

If you had a system that detects "feeders" based on ingame deaths, I would be banned 100x over. Not because I intentionally feed, but because I suck at the game. This would be the same for many players, especially those in your wonderful land of **low bronze**. 

Onto the next point of how to address these feeders/trollers/afkers-
**Riot have implemented an ♥♥♥tonne of incentives to play in a premade 5.** 
What are these incentives? More mastery points, more IP, more hex tech loot (coming soon™). They even made it possible to queue with x many friends to play ranked. If you play with your mates, you wont have toxicity. You wont have feeders. You wont have AFK, trolls, or general potatoes. You can control who is in your team every single game and have the communication to come out victorious.

**What are you waiting for? There is literally nothing to lose. [Join a pre-made 5 today](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment)**

**Note**: If you feel someone is trolling intentionally, be sure to report them in the post-game screen. If you would like, you can read further on [what is,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q1) and [what isn't](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h2q1) reportable behaviour.

lol, you can't just have a system that 'detects' feeders. What the hell are you on about? You're probably the type of person that reports people just because they've died a lot, not because they were actually Feeding, like running down midlane while all the towers are still up or something. Everyone has bad games, so don't just go around reporting people for playing badly.
